content.rendered:
Latest Events

Inspired event design

Curated Design Concepts befitting to you. Our favorite part;)⁠
⁠
Photography By 📸: @aralani

Open

Intentional event experiences that matter ✨🫶🏻👏🏼

#adornmentevents #engaged #pacificnwplanner #destinationwedding

Venue: Sauvie Island Private Residence

Open

Modern Chic Winery Wedding at Stoller Estates | Dundee OR✨🥂🤍🖤
Video 🔥 @nwfilmco

This 2 day production had our team working closely with our clients and the entire vendor team to create a custom curated wedding celebration for AJ, Alyssa & their guests ✨🫶🏻

The challenge for us is always finding a way to create unique experiences throughout the event. We want our events to speak our clients and to feel individual.

Dream Vendor Team:
Floral | @mimosafloralco
Photography | @megankayphotography
Videography | @nwfilmco
Vintage Rentals | @lilyandcane
Custom Signage | @cravedesign
Rentals | @ardeneventcollective
Catering | @stollerwine
DJ | @pdxdjs
Makeup + Hair | @thebeautyeditandco

Open

Chef’s Kiss 😘- when months of planning + designing comes together. Did we mention we love our clients? Partnership is everything. You and trust us - together we can be unstoppable. 👏🏼🥂🫶🏻💯

#engaged #weddingdesign #weddingfloral #tablesetting #weddingplanner #eventplannerlife #pacnw #wedding

Open

We listen to our clients and see their visions through. Transforming spaces and custom curating is our passion!

So often our hugely intelligent clients have an idea but can’t put it together visually. We really do pride ourselves in partnering, understanding and CREATING. For special events thoughtful is everything, and that’s where we shine ✨✨

#adornmentevents #customcurating #pacificnwplanner #weddingplanner #socialevents #corporateteambuilding #tablescape

Open

Cheers to 2023 🥂✨ we created bonds + partnerships dreams are made of. We were challenged, traveled more than ever, and created things we are proud of. 2024, we can only hope for more of the same! 💯✨🫶🏻🥂

Open

Lighting✨, theme 🧣, and Holiday magic 🪄 🎄. So much fun had turning this ballroom into a room full of trees, plaid, ski chalet projections and snowflakes to take this corporate holiday party to the mountains. Happy Holidays to all our friends 🥂✨

Open

Trusting the process is hard. But a good track record 🏆, positive attitude 🧘and amazing vendor partnerships 🤝 is a good sign🪧 you’ve hired someone that cares about their craft. We love 🤍 designing and bringing our couples visions to life. Favorite part - seeing their face when they walk into the room after it’s all set. 🤩👏🏼🖤

#adornmentevents #pdxplanner #eventdesign #weddingplanner #corporateplanner #trustus

Floral | @mimosafloralco
Venue | @stollerwine
Photographer | @megankayphotography
Videographer | @nwfilmco
Rentals | @ardeneventcollective & @adornmentevents
Signage + Creative | @cravedesign
Design + Planning | @adornmentevents

Open

You don’t know, until you know 😉. Our couples are capable, smart, go getters. Which usually means their lives are already full of to dos and when you start adding wedding planning to it, things can become stressful. We are always bummed when people come to us late in the game - because we want to help. I would like to say what we do is priceless 💎 - someone to pull your vibe + design together? 👏🏼 Deal with the deadlines and the vendor questions? Manage all the orders? 🙌🏼 Onsite setting up + fixing things that go wrong? 💪🏼Someone fending for your happiness and saving you time ⏰ - which let’s be honest is precious 💯.

#adornmentevents #eventdesign #weddingpro #pdxplanner #pnwwedding #timeisprecious

Open

Sometimes so many guests can force you into a cookie cutter layout for your wedding. We took advantage of this historic PDX venue mixing tables and decor - assuring all felt the 🤍 Also the true difference hiring a planner vs a day of coordinator 💪🏼☑️

#adornmentevents #customdesign #customwedding #pdxweddingplanner #pacnwplanner #eventdesign #modernwedding

Open

We support all dreams, reject nay sayers, promote beauty & love for all people

#adornmentevents #whatif #beyou

Open

Trees 🌲 + Candle Glow ✨ = warm & inviting tablescapes

#adornmentevents #pdxplanner #greentablesetting #pacificnwwedding #pacnw #tablescape #corporatedesigner

📸 @moscastudio

Open

Thank you for showing up! 👏🏼🙌🏼. We called on members of our event vendor community to join fundraising efforts for @nwnativechamber supporting educational + economic opportunities for our indigenous community. We are SO proud to shout out those businesses that donated toward our Fundraising Gala “The Gathering” ⬇️💪🏼⬇️

@maysarawinery and Hanna for the largest set of a wine goodies we have seen! So much love ❤️

@pearlcateringpdx + @urbanstudiopdx (Ashley) for a years worth of date nights at their collection of restaurants 👏🏼🥂

@benchmarkresortsandhotels & Todd your luxury hotel stay was a hit! ✨🏨

@blumpdx Jordan provided beautiful luscious ferns and candlelight to set off the place settings. Thanks for taking time out of your day 👏🏼😍

Being a part of a greater purpose and change feels so good. So honored that we have had these opportunities. Thanks for rolling with us 👏🏼

#adornmentevents #supportingcommunities #together #customevents #galas #fundraiser #pdxplanner

Open

Simple, small, classic. This vintage venue 40 person wedding 💒 @mildred_hall_portland was the perfect fit ✨

Open

We are so excited to share that we have been selected amongst a handful of small businesses on the West Coast as the Comcast Rise Small Business Recipient! ✨🌈🙌🏼

As a business that takes pride in community, inclusion, and spreading JOY - this felt like the real deal. Thank you @comcast and thanks to our community for believing in us.

We want to grow and create more experiences that expose other small businesses and shine light on the beautiful people of the Pacific NW. 🌲💯

We promise to keep bringing our best to you 💟✨

Open

Wine Country Joy ✨❤️ Congrats to the Darland’s! #winecountrywedding #pdxplanner #adornmentevents #findingjoy

Open
Follow on Instagram
